products.name: Arctiq Lager
products.description: This light tasting and straight-forward crispy boi goes down easy after a long day. Best served ARCTIQ cold.

products.name: Day For Night Stout
products.description: This delicious oatmeal stout pours as black as a cold January night. And with its high ABV% we hope you'll take your sweet time to sip, savour, and contemplate the lyrics of Gordon Downie, the Canadian poet-musician this beer is named after.

products.name: HopCTL IPA
products.description: It won't surprise you that many of our DevOps friends reach for the big bold hop-forward flavours of our HopCTRL IPA. Hazy, juicy, impossibly soft mouthfeel and resinous, dank pine notes for days.

products.name: Terrarium
products.description: This terrarium will looks great in your white painted living room.

products.name: Film Camera
products.description: This camera looks like it's a film camera, but it's actually digital.

products.name: Metal Camping Mug
products.description: You probably don't go camping that often but this is better than plastic cups.

products.name: City Bike
products.description: This single gear bike probably cannot climb the hills of San Francisco.

products.name: Air Plant
products.description: Have you ever wondered whether air plants need water? Buy one and figure out.
